tooltip.minecraft.flint_and_steel.1: §eYou can make colored fire by right-clicking the fire with a dye
tooltip.minecraft.flint_and_steel.2: §8§oColored fire does not make sound, cause damage, or emit particles
tooltip.rftoolsdim.realized_dimension_ta: §eYou can delete a dimension in the Dimension Editor, using a TNT
tooltip.rebornstorage.advanced_wireless_: §cDoes not work with Infinity Range Booster, and it doesn't seem to work with Dimension Card either
tooltip.refinedstorage.controller.1: §eIf you have issues with accessing RS from Wireless sources or others, try changing the controller to another chunk
tooltip.ironfurnaces.million_furnace.1: §eWill smelt an entire stack in one go!
tooltip.projecte.dm_pedestal.1: §eYou can break the block while sneaking to break it without specific tools
tooltip.projectexpansion.emc_link.2: §6Turns off when the player is offline. This is intended by the mod, use a chest or similar as a buffer!
tooltip.projectexpansion.emc_link.3: §eSneak+Right-click with a different EMC link to replace it (the filter is preserved)
tooltip.projectexpansion.transmutation_i: §eSneak+Right-click with an item will learn it, but won't consume it (does not work with Tome of Knowledge)
tooltip.draconicevolution.awakened_draco: §eDid you know that the ingots from this block are highly grindeable?
tooltip.functionalstorage.puller_upgrade: §7Right clicking the item in hand, without a target, will cycle the entire stack
tooltip.projecte.klein_star.1: §eYou can charge your star in the left side of your transmutation table
§eRequires a charged EMC star in your inventory (or curios) to power this item
tooltip.buildinggadgets2.gadget_copy_pas: §cUsing this with tile entities can cause crashes! (Ender Storage blocks, some Create things, etc.)
tooltip.rftoolsdim.absorber.1: §eIf the absorber doesn't work the target might be disabled, check the dimlet on the workbench
tooltip.minecraft.firework_rocket.1: §eRecipe might not appear in JEI, look it up in MC's Wiki, the vanilla one works
tooltip.sophisticatedstorage.crafting_up: §cSome crafts might cause you to crash when using the upgrade, use with caution
tooltip.ae2.cable.1: §eCan §bsneak + right-click§e on another cable to replace them. Dense only works with other dense.
tooltip.mekanism.pipe.1: §eCan §bsneak + right-click§e on another cable of the same type, to replace it.
tooltip.easy_villagers.trader.1: §eRight click with the workstation block to add it to the block!
tooltip.modularrouters.camouflage_upgrad: §cUsing this with any cable related thing from AE2 will make the router invisible and inaccessible
tooltip.createutilities.void_motor.1: §cThis can sometimes cause TPS and/or Lag issues, use carefully
tooltip.kubejs.blutonium_ingot.1: §dProcessed from Cyanite in a Cyanite Reprocessor
tooltip.create.chromatic_compound.1: §bUsed to make Shadow Steel & Refined Radiance
tooltip.create.refined_radiance.1: §bDrop Chromatic Compound into a Beacon Beam
tooltip.framedblocks.framed_cube.1: §eYou can sneak right-click on certain cables (that offer no facades/covers) to add a frame cover
tooltip.framedblocks.framed_cube.2: §eSneak right-click with a block to change the appearance
tooltip.framedblocks.framed_cube.3: §eUse any wrench item to remove with sneak right-click
tooltip.#forge.wrenches.1: §eSneak left-click to toggle the frame of framed cables on/off
tooltip.#forge.wrenches.2: §eSneak right-click to make a frame from a framed cable pop off
tooltip.secret.warning.5: §dI knew I should have stayed in the pen!
tooltip.secret.warning.7: §dIs this the end of the swine?
tooltip.secret.warning.11: §dThis is a boar-ing way to go...
tooltip.secret.warning.14: §dYou can’t eat me; I’m too cute!
tooltip.secret.warning.16: §dYou’ll regret this when I’m in your stomach!
tooltip.secret.warning.17: §dWhatever they’re paying you, I’ll double it!
tooltip.secret.warning.18: §dYou could’ve just asked for a hug instead!
tooltip.secret.warning.19: §dSeriously? I thought we were cool, man!
tooltip.secret.warning.20: §dWhoa, buddy! Can’t we talk about this over a carrot?
tooltip.secret.warning.21: §dDo I look like a pork chop to you?
tooltip.secret.warning.26: §dWhat did I ever do to you?
tooltip.secret.warning.27: §dI just wanted to be your pet!
tooltip.secret.warning.28: §dYou’ll never find another pig like me!
tooltip.secret.warning.30: §dCan we at least talk this out?
tooltip.secret.warning.31: §d I have the power of God and Anime by my side!
tooltip.secret.warning.33: §dI guess this is the end of my tail...
tooltip.secret.warning.37: §dOink! I didn’t sign up for this!
